songs.lyrics:
Chopiyeko satya chopiyeko artha
Lukiyeka aawaj lukiyeka yathartha

Jo dekhincha tyo hudaina
Chahera pani rokna sakinna
Wastabikta kahile agadi hudaina
Yo saanjh dhaldai cha
Andhakar baddaicha
Bholiko bihani kurirahechu ma
Aawaran, aawaaran...
Satyata jhai chhopiyeko
Kaalo andhakaar le gheriyeko
Gharma ekohoriyeko
Dristi le na dekhiyeko
Na lekhiyeko chha paanaa ma
Na huncha yesko saamanaa
Sabai ko chha aafno dhaaranaa
Marne ho ke lai paalanaa
Aawaran, aawaaran...
Satyataa jhai chhopiyeko
Kaalo andhakaanar le gheriyeko
Gharma ekohoriyeko
Dristi le na dekhiyeko
Na lekhiyeko chha paanaamaa
Na hunchha yesko saamanaa
Sabai ko cha aafno dhaarana
Marne ho ke lai paalanaa)

Saansarik biswaas vanda taadha cha
Maya moha vandaa gaada cha
Pura kura ni aadha cha
Kharani ajha taaza cha
Yetharta pani hoina
Jo aakha agi chhaina
Asatyata ni haina
Tara surakh kehi chhaina
Maatra chha kaalo raat ani
Eklo panaako saath
Rokinchhan paaila haru
Badauna khojchhau jaba haat
Andhero nai chha jiban
Bina kehi surya kiran
Thaha chhaina hunchha kaile
Gantabya sanga milan
Ek dam mai bichitra ko
Kasto ho yo pagalpan
Lakchyan haru chhan saadaran
Tara ke ho yo baalaapan
Saanta istir aacharan le
Purna chha baatawaran
Chhopiyeko asthitwo yesko
Yo ho aawaran

Saajh dhaldaicha
Andhakaar baddaichha
Voliko bihani
Kurirahechu ma

Aawaran, aawaaran...
Satyata jhain chopiyeko
Kaalo andhakarle gheriyeko
Gharma ekohoriyeko
Dristi le na dekhiyeko
Na lekhiyeko chha paanamaa
Na huncha yesko saamanaa
Sabai ko chha aafno dhaaranaa
Marne ho ke lai paalanaa
Aawaran... aawaran...
Satyataa jhain chhopiyeko
Kaalo andhakaar le gheriyeko
Gharma ekohoriyeko
Dristi le na dekhiyeko
Na lekhiyeko chha paanaamaa
Na huncha yesko saamanaa
Sabai ko chha aafnai dhaaranaa
Marne ho ke lai paalanaa
songs.title: Aawaran
